info.title: Blitz OpenAPI Reference
info.description:
Welcome to the Blitz API Reference.

Use this interactive documentation to test endpoints directly in your browser. Authentication is required via the `x-api-key` header.

include_title.description: List of job titles to search for (e.g., `['CEO', 'Founder']`).

exclude_title.description: Keywords to exclude from job titles (e.g., `['Assistant', 'Intern']`).

include_headline_search.description: If `true`, the search includes the user's bio/headline, not just the current job title.

cascade.description: An ordered list of search criteria (steps). The API stops at the first successful step.

max_results.description: Maximum number of profiles to retrieve.

found.description: Indicates if a phone number was found.

phone.description: The direct business phone number in international format.

found.description: Indicates if an email was found.

credits_reset_at.description: Date of the next credit reset.

key.description: The field that matched the search criteria.

icp.description: The index of the cascade step that matched (1 = first step).

what_matched.description: Details on why this profile was selected.

WaterfallICPRealTimeResult.description: Detailed profile result from real-time LinkedIn search.

experience.description: Work experience history.

icp.description: The index of the cascade step that matched (1 = first step).

what_matched.description: Details on why this profile was selected.

WaterfallICPRealTimeResponse.description: Response from the real-time Waterfall ICP search with detailed profile data.

post.description:
### üí∞ Cost: 3 Credits (on success)

Locate a verified direct business phone number using LinkedIn context.

> **Use case:** Ideal for multichannel cadences or cold calling strategies.

### üí∞ Cost: 1 Credit (on success)

From a LinkedIn profile URL, instantly find a verified work email. Emails are validated in real time (catch-all included).

### üí∞ Cost: 0.5 Credits (on success)

Bridge the gap between LinkedIn and email domains. Given a company‚Äôs LinkedIn URL, find its verified email domain.

get.description:
### üí∞ Cost: 0 Credits

Check your current balance, plan status, and key validity.

post.description:
### üí∞ Cost: 0.5 Credits

Perform a deep SMTP check to validate the deliverability of an email address. Detects catch-all configurations.

### üí∞ Cost: 1 Credit per result

This is the core engine for Account-Based Prospecting. Define an ICP hierarchy (e.g. CEO ‚Üí VP Sales), and BlitzAPI will search progressively through each level until a decision-maker is found.

[See Country Codes List](/guide/reference/appendix#common-country-codes-list)

#### How to use `cascade`
This parameter is an array of objects. Each object represents a search step:
1.  **Level 1**: Search for C-Levels.
2.  **Level 2**: Search for VPs.
3.  **Level 3**: Search for Directors.

post.description:
### üí∞ Cost: 3 Credits per result

Similar to the standard Waterfall search, but queries the LinkedIn network **live**. Use this for niche targets or when the standard search yields no results.

> **Warning:** Latency is higher (3-5 seconds).

basic_info.headline: Senior Content Marketing Manager @ Welcome to the Jungle (France)

experience.title: Content Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Objectives: 
- Lead generation through content creation & optimisation
- Awareness + position Contentsquare as an expert 
- Support the French marketing team in developing digital campaigns to drive business
- Ensure adoption of content produced by Contentsquare internally & externally

Achievements:
1/ Business:
- increased contribution from digital: in 2019, 26% of leads, in 2021, 55%
- increased number of downloads: 2019 -> 2022 :  +210%
- increased number of opportunities from content: 2020 -> 2021 +69%

2/ Content, Awareness & thought-leadership:
- implementation of an editorial content strategy: moving from ad-hoc & evergreen content to macro campaigns based on content
- Creation of a podcast: CX circle by Contentsquare, 32 episodes, recycling and/or creating content
- Development of the CX circle Magazine: 1 per year, 4 editions in total, print & digital, top brands interviewed: Le Printemps, Accor, Cnam, Zoom, Le Monde, Carrefour, Kusmi Tea‚Ä¶
- Creation of a monthly newsletter: La Lettre de l‚ÄôExp√©rience Digitale
- Event content: prepping exec speakers and creating their keynotes (topic, content & slides), support external C-level speakers in their preparation 
- Development of key content assets: Digital Experience Benchmark, use cases, interviews, ebooks, guides, videos‚Ä¶

3/ Enablement & internal voice:
- close work with teams such as Design, SDRs, Sales, CSMs, Comms, global teams‚Ä¶ 
- creation of an enablement system to both identify business needs and topics for the content roadmap (verticals, markets‚Ä¶) + to ensure all teams are comfortable with the content and that they can pitch it/use it 
=> monthly meetings, dedicated ad hoc sessions, dedicated presentations, slack channel, content for each team and library‚Ä¶

4/Campaign Management:
- implementation of kick off & post mortem sessions for major campaigns
- creation of campaign working documents: key messaging, key figures & objectives, comm plan, to do, budget, dashboards‚Ä¶
- project management

experience.description:

Achievements:

‚Üí Marketing & Communication -> Implementation of the content and the brand strategy according to the communication plan, within all channels: website, paid campaigns, social media, emailing, media partnerships, press, print branding‚Ä¶
‚Üí Project Management -> Communication management of the Awards Ceremony, coordination of the conference programme, PR management, reporting...

KPIs: +900% leads between 2018/2019 & +68%  Feb. to Oct. 2019
         +54% show attendees in 2019 vs 2018, +24% in turnover
